name: Necrohydra
description: The Necrohydra is a massive undead creature with five fleshy heads. Its fearsome presence is amplified by an overall rotting and intimidating appearance, designed to dominate the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear through its Dreadful Dirge and its formidable multiattack with multiple heads makes it a uniquely terrifying opponent.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and instill fear in its adversaries.
relations: May be found among other undead or serving dark powers.
environment: Typically inhabits dark, forsaken places where death and decay are prevalent.
strengths: Immunities to poison and exhaustion make it a durable foe; multiple heads provide advantages in combat.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence lead to poor maneuverability and tactical choices.
attacks: It can make multiple Bite attacks per round, dealing both piercing and necrotic damage with each successful hit.
most_powerful_ability: Dreadful Dirge, which frightens creatures in its vicinity and can control the battlefield through fear.
senses: Possesses a high passive Perception of 18, indicating a keen ability to notice details.
skills: Skilled in Perception with a +8 modifier, allowing it to notice environmental details effectively.
additional_information: Undead nature grants immunity to basic biological needs.
Reactive Heads allow for additional reactions against enemies.
Multiple Heads provide advantages on saving throws against various conditions.
Can spew necrotic bile in a devastating cone attack.
The fear-inducing abilities cause significant psychological impact on opponents.
test_queries: massive undead creature with multiple heads
creature that uses necrotic bile attack
battlefield dominator with dreadful dirge ability
